Fit an Analysis of Variance Model

Source: R/3-stats-test-functions.R
rowEqualVarOneWayAnova.Rd

Computes the one-way analysis of variance test for each feature.

See the Details section below for further information.

Usage

rowEqualVarOneWayAnova(x, g)

Arguments

x

numeric matrix.

g

a vector specifying group membership for each observation of x.

Value

A list containing two elements:

statistic

A numeric vector, the values of the test statistic

significance

A numeric vector, the p-values of the selected test

Details

It is a wrapper to row_oneway_equalvar function.

Author

Alessandro Barberis

Examples

#Seed
set.seed(1010)

#Data
x = matrix(rnorm(100 * 20), 100, 20)
g = sample(c(0,1), 20, replace = TRUE)

#Compute
rowEqualVarOneWayAnova(x = x, g = g)
